Class GridWorld

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.World
GridWorld
public class GridWorld extends greenfoot.World
Main world that uses a 2d array to create the board using the coding techniques mentioned in class
Author:
Owen, Joe, Saiful

    • addBomb

      public void addBomb(Block location, boolean isWhite)
      Adds a bomb to a specific location on the board
      Parameters:
      location - coordinates of the block
      isWhite - true if the bomb is the white players, false if it belongs to the black player

      y - column index
      Returns:
